name: Specifier Legacy
description: A simple program written in AppleScript that gives detailed information about your Mac.
longDescription:
This simple application, written 100% in AppleScript aims to provide a more robust and detailed way to display your Mac's specs! This application will show information that the stock About this Mac will not, such as your full CPU model information.

Specifier uses shell commands to grab your Mac's specs, so editing and adding more options to Specifier is easy! Specifier also (as of v2.1) has custom config support, making it more configurable and powerful.
systemRequirements: Any PowerPC*, Intel, or Apple Silicon Mac
Precompiled binary supports Intel and Apple Silicon

name: Metal HUD Utility
description: A simple Swift application that allows you to permanently and easily enable and disable Apple's Metal HUD which ships with macOS.
longDescription:
Metal HUD Utility is a simple Swift application that allows you to permanently and easily enable and disable Apple's Metal HUD which ships with macOS.

Features:
• Simple interface with toggle
• A simple Metal demo to test the Metal HUD
• Easy enable/disable functionality for Apple's built-in Metal performance overlay
systemRequirements: Any Mac with dedicated or integrated graphics supporting Metal

name: Windows 7 Essential Updates Installer
description: The Windows 7 Essential Updates installer does what it says - it installs .msu files and also the Windows Update Agent.
longDescription:
The Windows 7 Essential Updates installer is a utility designed to help maintain Windows 7 systems by installing essential updates and the Windows Update Agent.

Features:
• Installs essential .msu update files
• Updates the Windows Update Agent
• Simple interface for easy operation
• Helps keep legacy Windows 7 systems updated
